Forking [this thread](%63mEaD+n9QOI0nI5FpzB5unoXZkay66hHYNoM8pnlOo=.sha256):

[@kas](@RuNxm8SRujPcJx6GjtTQHp6hprAFv5voEkcvoAkB8Pk=.ed25519) Is ssb-fulltext still maintained? I can't find it anywhere and it seems to have been replaced by [ssb-search](https://github.com/ssbc/ssb-search). Could that be right? Otherwise, could you link me to the ssb-fulltext codebase? Thanks!
